example.eg: Everybody except you will be going on the trip.  Everyone here's blonde except for Jane, who's brunette.
example.egtrans: 除了你之外，每个人都会去旅行。这里除了简是褐发以外，每个女子都是金发。

dsense.name: except, except that
dsense.guideword: (were it not for the fact that) (后接从句)

example.eg: Liz would have come with us except that she had already accepted another invitation.
example.egtrans: 要不是莉兹已经接受了其他邀请，她就和我们一起来了。

example.eg: She would have been afraid to speak, except for his reassuring smile.
example.egtrans: 要是没有他令人宽慰的微笑，她当时肯定不敢开口说话。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 要是没有, 如果没有

example.eg: Guide dogs are excepted from the "no dogs allowed" rule.
example.egtrans: 导盲犬不受“禁止带狗入内”规则的限制。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…排除在外，把…除外，不把…包括在内

example.eg: Minors are not admitted except if accompanied by an adult.
